welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Russell, Canada! Known for its small town charm and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited access in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Gatineau-Ottawa Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Gatineau-Ottawa Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rockcliffe St Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights, with exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
